title: Privacy Badger is a free browser extension made by EFF to stop spying
author: doener
aiHeadline: EFF releases Privacy Badger, because apparently, not being watched 24/7 wasn't an option anymore.

title: The AI coding trap
author: chrisloy
aiHeadline: AI is now coding for us, which is great—except when it writes code that makes us question our life choices.

title: When I say “alphabetical order”, I mean “alphabetical order”
author: sebtron
aiHeadline: One developer's quest to enforce perfect alphabetical order, because clearly, the universe wasn't orderly enough on its own.

title: Play snake in the URL address bar
author: macote
aiHeadline: Finally, a way to waste even more time online—play Snake directly in your URL bar, because who needs productivity anyway?

title: Why I gave the world wide web away for free
author: n1b0m
aiHeadline: The inventor of the World Wide Web reveals why they gave it away for free, because apparently, selling it for a billion dollars wasn't on their list of life goals.
